title: Cube Craft: Minecraft inspired demo
subtitle: Unreal Engine 5 | Blueprints | Building Game
content: A first person building game created using Unreal Engine 5 and Blueprints.
description: A Minecraft-style game has been developed in Unreal Engine using Blueprints. This is my first prototype in Unreal Engine, and was learning the tool along with this project.
roles: Designed and developed the concept of the game
Utilize Blueprints to create a playable demo
Modular code to expand, asset integration (models, animations)
details: In this first-person game, players have the ability to gather resources and erect blocks to construct their own village or base, selecting from a variety of six block types. The game boasts several features including Raycasting, a Save/Load System, UI system, Actor spawning, among others. Credit for the 3D model assets goes to Tidal Flask Studios.
